data.actual_result: Hearing notification sounds for yourself and other users joining/leaving the voice channel when you do not appear to be in it
data.expected_result: No notification sounds when you are not in the voice channel
data.short_description: Hearing notifications for voice channel when not rejoining after leaving and rejoining the server
data.steps_to_repro: - Join voice channel on a server that has other members in the voice channel - Leave server without disconnecting from voice channel - Rejoin server
